system.description: This spell makes a melee weapon deadly to undead. Any undead creature struck in combat must succeed on a DC 14 Will save or be destroyed. A weapon enhanced by disrupting weapon is subject to the same saving throw if it is used to attack an undead creature. The spell does not affect undead that are not subject to turning. Success indicates the weapon functions as a normal weapon for that attack.
system.savingThrow: Will negates (object) or Will negates (undead); see text
